title: US Oil Rig Count Stages A Comeback After Last Week’s Losses

title: Equinor Makes Two Large Gas Discoveries in Norway’s North Sea
summary: Equinor announced on Friday two gas and condensate discoveries in the Norwegian part of the North Sea in its largest discoveries so far this year that can be developed through existing infrastructure.
